# [[age]] {{gloss|of a person}}

====Usage notes====
{{zh-l|年齡}} and {{zh-l|年紀|tr=niánjì}} are different in that the former can refer to the age of a person, plant or heavenly body, while the latter can only refer to the age of a person.
